error.message: Parameter $event of method Drupal\login_switch\Routing\ExceptionEventSubscriber::onException() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseForExceptionEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ExceptionEvent instead
Call to deprecated method setException() of class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseForExceptionEvent: since Symfony 4.4, use setThrowable instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
